original_text: And at the end of the seven years, when the woman returned from the land of the Philistines, she went to appeal to the king for her house and her land.
korean_text: 칠 년이 다하매 여인이 블레셋 사람들의 땅에서 돌아와 자기 집과 전토를 위하여 호소하려 하여 왕에게 나아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And at the end of the seven years
when the woman returned from the land of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자가 블레셋 땅에서 돌아왔을 때

sentences.original_text: she went to appeal to the king
for her house and her land
